name: SimpleSlider
tagline: simple jQuery contents / images slider plugin
body:
# Features * Images Slides * Text / HTML Slides * Videos Slides * Slides Right/Left * Slides Up/Down * Control Speed * No CSS required * any slider height/width * Setup in 1 minute ##Demo * [Slide Right/Left](http://htmlpreview.github.com/?https://github.com/amaroks/simpleSlider/blob/master/index.htm) * [Slide Up/Down](http://htmlpreview.github.com/?https://github.com/amaroks/simpleSlider/blob/master/updown_demo.htm) ## a complete example ``` simpleSlider - Right/Left Demo
``` Change sliding direction from Left/Right to Up/Down ``` $("#sliders").simpleSlider({direction: "up" }); ``` Change sliding direction and change sliding speed (in ms) ``` $("#sliders").simpleSlider({direction: "up", speed: 300 }); ```
